justification: "Continuous measures of anxiety symptomatology were obtained using the State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI)"
The methods state that "recent depression symptoms [were obtained] using the Beck Depression Inventory (BDI)."
Diagnostic status was established "according to the Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview (MINI)."
construct: DSM-style psychiatric diagnosis (GAD, MDD, Panic Disorder)

justification: As a manipulation check, "participants retrospectively rated how anxious they felt during the safe and threat conditions on a scale from 1 ('not at all') to 10 ('very much so')."

measured_by: four-armed bandit task with bandit4arm_lapse reinforcement-learning model
justification: The paper explains that "‘Multi-armed bandit’ tasks can probe this decision making under uncertainty" and that learning is quantified through reinforcement-learning parameters such as "learning rate"; the winning model (bandit4arm_lapse) provided individual "punishment learning rate" estimates used in the analyses.
construct: Punishment learning rate in decision-making under uncertainty
